content:
System.Runtime.DesignerServices Namespace

Definition

The System.Runtime.DesignerServices namespace provides classes that support application and component designers in integrated development environments.

In this Article

Classes

WindowsRuntimeDesignerContext

Provides customized assembly binding for designers that are used to create Windows 8.x Store apps.
